description: John grabs your hand an the two of you walk into the room. The room is small, but theres a desk on one wall near the door, and a tall screen hiding a bed, and a full length mirror in the corner. /n A pair of candles in sconces lights the room with a warm glow. The room feels comfortable and warm.

prompt:
'Will you marry me?' 

The question rings over and over again in your mind, and your conviction grows (yes, no)

description:
You say 'Yes!' 
Tears fill your eyes and the eyes of the man. The two of you hold hands and walk across the room. 
You walk to the bed in the corner of the room, sheltered by the screen. The feelings inside of you sing as the two of you hold onto each other. 
..... 
As the two of you sit together, the feeling of hope and excitement has given way to satisfaction and contentment. 
The man leans in and kisses you, whispering into your ear. 
 'I love you. Thank you for loving me. I'm trapped here, but take this so we can be together and remember each other.' 
The man holds out his hand and shows you two rings. As you reach out to touch them, he takes your left hand and puts a 
small thin band on your ring finger. 
 'Would you play me a song?' 
 You pull out the flute and play a joyful tune.
Music fills the room, and the lights seem to grow brighter. After you finish the song, you reach down and put the other ring on the hand of the man. 
You promise your undying love to him. As the ring slips over his last knuckle, the room starts to fade. 
You hold on to the headboard of the bed, but a feeling of grief and loss washes over you, as the room fades to black. 

Something warm and wet rubs across your face. You open your eyes to see the dog licking your face. 
 'You're awake! I was worried you'd never wake up. You've been out for a while. Got any pets?'

You say 'No.' 
The man looks at you and smiles. 'I understand. I'm sorry.' 
You walk away from the room and back to the cave entrance.
